note:
'.. a soul for a compass /.. a heart for a pair of wings'
'Who needs the static / It hurts the head'
'.. laughter came too easy / For life to pass me by'
'Mas bendita esta loucura / De cantar e de viver'
'.. it's all the same to me /.. let the mystery be'
---------------------------------------------
An agnostic atheist.
Lives in Selkirk, Scottish Borders.
Interests: Sightseeing, Photography, Walking, The Local Bird Life, Computing, Website Design, Real Ale, Single Malt Whisky, Art and Music.
